scripts.compile: lerna exec 'yarn build' --scope=@rc-ex/core && lerna exec 'yarn build' --no-private --ignore=@rc-ex/core
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn reset && yarn compile && yarn test
scripts.upgrade-all: yarn-upgrade-all -W && yarn workspaces run yarn-upgrade-all && yarn install
scripts.reinstall: lerna exec 'rm -rf node_modules' && yarn install && lerna exec 'yarn install'
